productName: Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Gear T-1
description:
Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Gear T-1

The Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Gear T-1 is a high-precision replacement part designed to restore smooth and reliable power window operation. Manufactured using durable, wear-resistant material, this gear ensures proper torque transfer between the motor and regulator system. Ideal for replacing worn or damaged gears, it helps eliminate window jamming, noise, and uneven movement.

Key Features:

Compatible with Mahindra XUV500

High-strength gear material for long life

Smooth power window movement

Direct fit replacement, easy installation

Reduces motor strain and noise

Application: Power Window System
Vehicle Compatibility: Mahindra XUV500

Ensures smooth and silent operation

productName: Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Regulator Machine
description:
Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Regulator Machine

The Mahindra XUV500 Power Window Regulator Machine is a complete window lifting mechanism designed for precise glass movement and long-term reliability. Manufactured from high-quality metal components, it ensures smooth up-down operation and proper alignment of the window glass.
